<WG3739> <WG1063> For Whoever <WG302> May Desire <WG2309> <WG3588> <WG5590> His Life <WG846> To Save, <WG4982> Shall Lose <WG622> It, <WG846> <WG3739> ' <WG1161> But Whoever <WG302> May Lose <WG622> <WG3588> <WG5590> His Life <WG846> On Account Of <WG1752> Me <WG1700> And <WG2532> Of The <WG3588> Glad Tidings, <WG2098> He <WG3778> Shall Save <WG4982> It. <WG846>
